mapper.select: select c.course_name from course c inner join teaching_activities ta on c.course_id = ta.course_id where ta.teaching_activities_id = #{id};
select t.teacher_name from teacher t inner join teaching_activities ta on t.teacher_id = ta.teacher_id where ta.teaching_activities_id = #{id};
select s.schedule_id from teaching_activities ta inner join schedule s on ta.teaching_activities_id = s.teaching_activities_id where ta.teaching_activities_id = #{id};

select teaching_activities_id, c.course_id, c.course_name, t.teacher_id, t2.teacher_name, t2.gender, t2.phone, semester, plan, week_period, credit, proportion, remark from teaching_activities t inner join course c on t.course_id = c.course_id inner join teacher t2 on t.teacher_id = t2.teacher_id where t.teacher_id = #{id} and t.semester = #{semester};
